meanings.sent1: The music loudened as the band played on.
meanings.sent2: The crowd loudened their cheers as the team scored a goal.
meanings.sent3: The volume on the TV loudened so much that the neighbors could hear it!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter loudened the room, filling it with joy.
meanings.sent5: The storm loudened, shaking the windows with its power.

meanings.sent1: She loudened her voice to be heard over the noise.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic loudened the engine to test its strength.
meanings.sent3: He loudened the music to annoy his sister who was studying.
meanings.sent4: The teacher loudened her instructions to ensure everyone understood.
meanings.sent5: The chef loudened the sizzle of the steak on the grill.
